column4:
['Shada shadak dil kare dhak dhak', '
Dhak dhak dhak dhak', '
Shada shadak dil kare dhak dhak', '
Aur khanke mora kangana', '
Bachpan bita aayi jawani', '
Chhut chala ab babul ka angana', '
Shada shadak dil kare dhak dhak', '
Dhak dhak dhak dhak', 'Bhaiya ne dhunda war mera', '
To dhunda no phut lamba', '
Bhaiya ne dhunda war mera', '
To dhunda no phut lamba', '
Dekhu to aisa lage jaise kaise', '
Dekhu to aisa lage jaise', '
Ho bijli ka khamba par kya karu', '
Haye re ab kya karu haye kya karu', '
Haye re ab kya karu', '
Shada shadak dil kare dhak dhak', '
Dhak dhak dhak dhak', 'Chacha ne dhunda war mera', '
To dhunda itna mota', '
Shada shadak dil kare dhak dhak', '
Dhak dhak dhak dhak', '
Chale sadak par aise jaise kaise', '
Chale sadak par aise jaise', '
Bependi ka lota haye kya karu', '
Haye re ab kya karu haye kya karu', '
Haye re ab kya karu', '
Shada shadak dil kare dhak dhak', '
Dhak dhak dhak dhak', 'Tau ne dhunda war mera', '
To dhunda itna kala', '
Tau ne dhunda war mera', '
To dhunda itna kala', '
Unt samjh ke bhag uthe re hui ma', '
Unt samjh ke bhag uthe', '
Har koi dekhne wala', '
Haye kya karu', '
Haye re ab kya karu haye kya karu', '
Haye re ab kya karu', '
Shada shadak dil kare dhak dhak', '
Dhak dhak dhak dhak', 'Na bijli ka khamba na', '
Wo mota na wo kala', '
Babul ne dhunda war mera', '
To dhunda sabse nyara', '
Na koi aisa phool chaman mein', '
Na koi gagan mein tara', '
Jhuti chal jhuti kab dekha tune', '
Dekha ha dekha', '
Use na dekha par dekha hai', '
Use na dekha par dekha hai', '
Uska sapna pyara', '
Haye kya karu', '
Haye re ab kya karu haye kya karu', '
Haye re ab kya karu', '
Shada shadak dil kare dhak dhak', '
Dhak dhak dhak dhak.']
